DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare effectiveness topically apply lidocaine-prilocaine ( EMLA ) cream local anesthetic ( lidocaine ) infiltration post-cesarean section pain . Research Question : Is lidocaine-prilocaine ( EMLA ) cream application effective compare local anesthetic ( lidocaine ) infiltration post-caesarean section pain ? Research Hypothesis : Lidocaine-prilocaine ( EMLA ) cream application effective post_caesarean section pain compare local anesthetic ( lidocaine ) infiltration . Clinical Application : Topical Lidocaine-prilocaine ( EMLA ) cream could apply frequent time postoperatively , unlike infiltration local anesthetic .
